content: Hi, just wondering if the KamalaHQ Threads account is going to be getting federated with the Fediverse anytime soon? I'd like to be able to repost it from my Mastodon account, and it seems that others would, too: https://fasol.org/@fasol/112955462789994850
...ah, apparently there was already a post about this: https://discord.com/channels/1242249109298221066/1250550849998946417/1274454200050258102
Ditto, I had the same question from my community in Mastodon. Also, I believe Bluesky folks would like something too , although Fediverse won't be possible there.
